name: Monster Gun Shop
description:
A game where you have to become the best gun shop owner by defeating others with weapon cards and effect cards. 

RULES:

You have a deck that mixes two types of cards: WEAPONS and EFFECTS. Cards are added to the decks with each victory over your opponent.
You have 2 slots: DEFENSE WEAPON and EFFECTS. At the start of your turn, you may place cards from your deck into slots. You can also attack (drag cards on the opponent to attack).
DEFENSIVE WEAPON deals n-2 (minimum 1) damage to the attacker when attacked
EFFECTS give improvements
You have 4 cards in your hand, you can only discard 1 card and draw 1 card in 1 turn.
You attack with cards in your hand, depending on the number of COINS. At the beginning of the game you have 5 COINS. At the start of your turn, you are given +3 COINS.
